sub_title: Strategic Talent Management| Recruitment | Training | Career Advice | Driving change to ensure talent growth
summary:
Multilingual HR professional with passion for Strategic Talent Management (STM) and Recruitment & Selection. With experience in private, public and not-for-profit sectors I've reinvented myself from a lawyer into a business-minded STM expert: solving challenges related to finding, selecting and optimally employing the right talent, ensuring integrity and focusing on DEI, along with driving change and improving processes. I make impact by combining creativity and a structured approach to solve problems, analyze and improve existing practices. My passion is to work today on the talent that is fit for tomorrow's challenges.

Specialties: Strategic Talent Management, Recruitment and selection, process analysis and improvement, coaching and mentoring, training, leadership development, relations management, data analysis and reporting.
